channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Up to 40% Off Garden D?cor
channel.desc: Up to 40% Off Garden D?cor.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Summer Sleepover
channel.desc: Sleep is essential to feeling refreshed and rested, so make sure you get a good rest with our range of cool, lightweight bedding and more to help you through those warm summer nights.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Home D?cor Sale
channel.desc: Spruce up your space with gorgeous home decor to help you make your house a home. From gorgeous ornaments to elegant decorations for your walls, find your home style right here at QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Grande Cosmetics
channel.desc: Feel naturally beautiful with Grande Cosmetics. Their transformative serums are designed to enhance your natural lashes, brows, hair, and lips, so you can feel empowered to be yourself every day.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Up to 40% Off Garden Offers
channel.desc: Up to 40% Off Garden Offers.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Gatineau
channel.desc: A specialist in skincare, Gatineau offers innovative and complete beauty treatment regimens to suit all skin types, for the busy women of today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Dannii Minogue Fashion Sale
channel.desc: Looking for fab fashion pieces in petite sizes? Dannii Minogue has you covered, plus we've got a host of fantastic Sale offers for you to discover too! Tune in and get shopping.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Feel Good Beauty
channel.desc: Find time-saving solutions, with a range of gadgets that aim to make everyday living that little bit easier and more comfortable.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Tommie Copper
channel.desc: Whether you're an athlete looking to improve your performance, or someone simply looking to live their best active life, Tommie Copper is your trusted partner in total body wellness.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.desc: A great time to fill up your wardrobe with amazing bargains - from this year's finest fashions to tried-and-tested classics.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Independent Living
channel.desc: Join us as we showcase products that help people with reduced mobility enjoy an active lifestyle. From mobility scooters to sound amplifiers, our range can help people improve their quality of life.

channel.title: MarlaWynne Sale
